title: UniCode Polywrap Sponsorship
body:
## Overview
We are looking to sponsor the upcoming Unicode Hackathon with stable coins.

The Unicode Hackathon will be a great way for participants to earn rewards for using Polywrap. 

## Proposed Sponsor Amount
Polywrap will award a total of 3 prizes valued at a total of **$4,000** in stablecoins:
- $2,000 for the best hack
- $1,000 for each runner-up

## Requirement for Hackathon Participants:
Our only requirement is that you build something using Polywrap.  Today, we have support for JavaScript applications, but plan to have support for any type of app in the future.
author: 0x937F5b32Bc3cafcd1B02462F93e6AE5a843f6C6A
